reviews.review:
[h1]*Good time of the day. Today I'll tell you, what DbD is*[/h1] 
Dead by Daylight - is funny, horror, screaming, axe throwing and cruel game
Dead by Daylight - is lobby simulator, Dwight mode in closets, and just 99% wiggling near a hook(
[list]
   [*] Why I'll stop playing for a while (until it fixed)
  My internet suddenly stopped and I had to restart it. I did this, meanwhile the game returned me to the main-main 
  menu, where "Press Space to start". I pressed as always, then game showed me the license agreement. I agreed (why 
  not?) and my rank was deranked from 7 rank to 16 and all of my characters are first level now. I wrote to the Behavior 
  company, so that they could help me (because a lot of people has this problem, too). I don't know will they help me, 
  restore my stats, but I think so because game is under work even now since patch 1.6.0. 
[/list]
   So that's all) Have a great day and take care <3

[i]P.S. I'll appreciate help and support even if you just read it because you have a lot of time out there.[/i]
  [spoiler]P.S.S. Don't forget to leave a like :D[/spoiler]


After one week Developers gave me some millions of BPs. That is really awesome that people are looking for issues and solving them. Thanks for all, Behavior :)

                                                             The game is bad just because of the community
                                                                            So I give only positive mark
I love this game. I'm not going to put work into this reveiw because other people already have done that. Just read theirs.

game sucks community sucks and the devs are the most clueless POS's out there the minute this game gets even a bit of competition bet it will die like their other games
This is the best game for the people who loves the true meaning of horror

This game is pretty good. Lots of content (maps, characters etc.) and updates, very few bugs and hackers. Good sense of replay-ability too, you also don't have to pay to get the DLC killers and survivors. You can earn them just by playing, apart from the licensed DLC (Michael Myers, Freddy Kruger etc.) which you do have to pay for.
 

9/10

Honestly, I do recommend the game. Despite the bugs, it is still fun.

The new Emblem system is great. It does not impact your blood points in any way. Many toxic survivor mains are pissed, but that's because it makes them actually work for the ranking. Rank, btw, means nothing. No rewards, no impact of any sort. I play 50/50, and I don't understand the fuss. As killer it kind of sucks, because the survivors can gen rush and get 2 or 3 done really fast, which hurts one of your emblems. 

Keeping the rank separate from blood point gain is a good idea. I don't think you can derank with the emblems either, which helps. At least, not until their monthly or every other month rank resets. The small bugs with the emblems aren't too bad, I don't understand why a lot of people are pissed with the update.

Please work on polishing the existing balance problems and bugs, but keep it up!
Great game, developers listened when we had issues early on.
Useless af ranking system! I'm rank 20, so was the rest of the survivors, the killer was rank 11..
eu recomendo a todos e muito loko
great game, very scary as a survivor and so much fun being the killer
why i cant play this game how many i try to instal and update i cant play this game help me to fix this problem

So years ago i gave a bad review to the devs.  I continue to stand by that bad review with more.  The developers continually make changes to the game AFTER PURCHASE.  Not minor changes but major game mechanic changes and now also force players to play against ranks they dont want to play against making the game LESS fun for everyone  Ya something i want to do is log into a game and spend 3 minutes getting camped by R1 killers so much fun.  Its not.  The devs listen only to a certain player base which would be streamers who bring them in so called revenue and claim they are what make the game which is totally false.  its the players who make the game and these guys at this rate will continue to fail.  They will get ZERO dollars out of me ever again and that includes future expansions/DLC.

Update to this they need to be sued for Fraud.  They keep changning major game mechanice after they sell it as is.  In USA that would be fraud...

Game continutes to be a NO and play at your own risk.  The toxicity of matches is totally ignored by devs and continually remains unblanaced.  The devs here do not care about the playbase they care about the money it brings in.  Money stops coming in they dont have a game.

this game keeps on bugging, me and my friends are trying to play before he has to go to work in another state. he cant bring his pc all they way over to where hes going. this game keeps on bugging me and my friends out of a lobby. we are trying to find a killer but it keeps saying internet has to be connected in order to play. i am connected to the internet. please fix this.

I learned everything I know about this game from these youtubers @Garuku Bluemoon @Lordminion777 @BreadHeroDan
This game is better than I thought it would be. I love it. Check out those youtubers, they are awesome, they have Playlist for Dead by Daylight, if you like them defiantly turn on the notification for that playlist. They definitely helped me find out about about this game. I highly recommend this game to anyone who is looking at buying this game. But if your not sure, check out those youtubers. You'll see how the game works, and if it sounds fun. I mean look at me. I bought after watching them play this game for over 7 months. It's definitely the best expierence I've had my entire life. ^.^

Unfortunately, I cannot say I enjoy this game. Not only is it riddled all over the place with bugs, but the dev's seem more focused on getting more DLC's out than actually fixing the game to make it enjoyable. Another issue is the matchmaking. I don't see it right to send rank 20 survivors into matches with rank 1 killers. Especially if those rank 20 survivors are completely new to the game and have no idea what they are doing. I hate to say this about a game that has a great concept, but I simply cannot stand by this game.

-First of all is a nice survival horror game to play with your friends
-It makes you addicted to it
-Even though the game is one year old its still laggy and buggy I mean come on guys fix this shit
-Sometimes it pisses me off with these killers who camp next to you till you die.OK thats your job killing ppl but isnt fair 
for the the survivors too
-Connection problems,cant connect to lobbies
-Its fun unlocking perks and stuff
-Nurse is so fucking OP nerf this shit 
Comparing to friday the 13th the game friday is better than DbD
-Friday you can play with all jasons
-They are 3 ways to escape Jason.Fisrtly by fixing cars.Secondly by calling the police.Thirdly by fixing the boat
-Survivors are not the same.Like us someone is better at fixing things and for example you who are watching this review 
you are better at maths than me
-Tommy Jarvis is an opportunity for the other survivors to escape and for someone who died and became Tommy to get that more xp
-You can fight Jason too
To sum up Friday 13th the game is more real and has better graphics
Now if someone cant buy Friday yeah Dead by Daylight is a good option go on and buy it!
To those who can buy Friday just buy it!
Im in the middle for Dead by Daylight but I will vote positiv though because I believe,they can fix the game a little bit.
Peace out ladies and gentlemen

I only have a few hours logged into the game so far, but I can honestly say this has become my current favorite game and is usually what I load up to both begin and end my day with (hopefully not dead). With that said there's a few things I'd like to see fixed myself.

1. Matchmaking can be horrendous at times. When queing for a game, constantly get the no network found error and it closes the game completely. If you do connect, you get kicked from your party and sent back to the home lobby about 10% of the time.

2. Keep consistent groupings. One thing I dislike is having to send invites after every game to friends I play with on the regular. If I play 20 games in a day, I have to make 60+ or so groups (due to the above, as its not just me these problems affect but my group mates also)

3. Latest patch penalizes Disconnects heavily. Usually that would be a good thing, but I had a game as a survivor earlier today where the killer disconnected almost instantly and we got the escape status screen. We got points for escaping, but I lost a rank pip due to not reaching a certain score. So if Salty Killers really wanted to just troll a group of survivors, they could just exit the game at the start and possibly cause them to lose rank. Maybe they dont like some of the offerings or survivor choices, who knows the mind of a killer?



And just as a preference, maybe a few emotes to communicate with your team. Currently the community has adapted a crouch spam as a way of getting attention and such. Maybe even a proximity voice ... and to balance it out a bit you could make it so that proximity voice / emotes can be heard by proximity killers.

I'd also like the ability to be able to have a group que as survivors and killers in the matchmaking. Randomize the killer if multiple people choose the role. Sometimes I want to be able to kill my friends (im such a good buddy) but dislike the idea of having to 1v1.
The best game you'll ever hate.

I have been playing this game since it's release and have 1300+ hours put into it. Even after a year I still find it fun and entertaining. Don't get me wrong, there are many frustrating things about this game. Some being campers, infinites, bugs, sandbaggers, long survive with friends qs and very salty people. I just find that the good outweighs the bad. It's thrilling and even after all this time a MM can still make me jump and scream. The devs seem to listen to their community and try to balance the game to keep people happy. I would recommend this game if you are looking for a heart-pounding good time.

This game is the best.I recommend it to anybody that wants to play a new game.Keep in mind,that at night the waiting times to join a game as survivor take a long time.Other than that, pick up this game.You won't regret it!
A really nice game to play with friends and with a good horror part in it.

amazing game to play with or without friends, but this game has some connection issues atm. 8/10

Dead by Daylight is a game that is infuriating and fun at the same time (kind of like rust). This is one of the best online horror games out there (most aren't very good)!  It has cool lore behind it even if it is a online only game. It is worth $20 but the DLC's are not worth it. I would wait until they make a bundle for it like they did for Payday 2 as the amount of DLC in this game is retarded. It is fun for a little while but gets boring quick. You can meet new friends or people to play with. This game has a horrible community though. Try to stay away from it lol!  The developers need to work on fixing bugs as well.  I would rate Dead By Daylight a 6/10 (mainly because it is repetitive and has a very bad business model).

Cannot recommend because:

1. Constant disconnects every 3-4 games even though I match the hardware requirements.
2. Aweful matchmaking. In 50% of matches I am (as rank 20 noob with one perk) matched with rank 1 Killers with best perks.
3. No comments from devs according the Problems. Priority is DLC quantity instead of fixing bugs and mechanics.

I really enjoy the concept of the game and will change to a recommendation if the devs fix the game.
The game looks good,i mean i havent even been able to play it, as the game just breaks and crashes every time i join a lobby. Fuck you devs.

I used to recommend this game, now I do not.

this game used to be very fun as a killer and as a survivor. Now the Devs have nerfed the killers and their perks to the ground and buffing the survivors and their perks to the extreme. There is no fun in playing as a killer now and playing as a survivor with their overpowered perks make it escaping with flying colours. 

As a survivor, all you need to do is earn points by doing most actions in the game, objectives, helping teammates, getting chased and earning points is pretty easy. Ranking up as survivor is a walk in a park and have a variety of escape perks that waste the killer's time easy.

As a killer, it is not rewarding to play anymore. The ranking system is changed instead of blood points, it is how many times you hooked and kill people. So if survivors just keep on pallet looping like they all do on these survivor sided maps, you do earn blood points but do not proceed to ranking up at all until you hook them. Killer perks have been nerfed to the ground as well and it makes it even harder to kill. Brutal Strength that was always used because it was so good against pallet looping has been nerfed and will never be where it was. Killers have animations that create time gaps for survivors to get away, which was fine before but now that they got stuff like sprint burst, dead hard, decisive strike, it creates way bigger time gaps and loses the survivor easy. Especially in Survive with Friends. When survivors are in groups have and communication, it makes the game 3 times as hard to play. You have to make no mistakes at all in order to rank up or break even on pipping.

I do not recommend this game at all in it's current state. It is way too unbalanced for an asymmetrical horror game. It is suppose to be killer be super strong and survivor should be scared, but now it is killer the one getting bullied and survivors are the ones controlling the game and the horror game has turned into a competitive ranking game.
